item.title: powershell
item.description: String Formatting Type Example Output Notes Formatting Switch 'select {0} from sys.tables' -f 'name' select name from sys.tables Same concept as .NET [string]::Format(). Token based replacement .NET String Format [string]::Format('select {0} from sys.tables','name') select name from sys.tables Why would you do this? Because you want to showoff your .NET chops? Math & Number Conversions From To Example Output Notes scientific notation Decimal 2.
